EmailTemplate.name: 05_6_2015 Partner Newsletter.Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Channel Partner Newsletter - May 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cloud & Virtualization Lessons You’ll Love Take control of your cloud and virtual environments Check out our new Partner video here: Watch Here <http://vmturbo.com/company/channel-partners?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=channelnewsmay&utm_content=050615>
Resources
Best Practices for vCPU to CPU Ratio Management <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vcpu-to-cpu-ratio-management?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=channelnewsmay&utm_content=050615>
Matt Ray, Sales Engineer at VMTurbo, discusses what is the best vCPU to CPU ratio to assure performance in your environment—he asks, “What’s the real goal here?”
<http://vmturbo.com/wp-virtualize-critical-apps/>How to Successfully Virtualize Business Critical Applications <http://vmturbo.com/wp-virtualize-critical-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=channelnewsmay&utm_content=050615> <http://vmturbo.com/wp-virtualize-critical-apps/>
Mastering the intricacies of virtualizing business-critical applications is crucial to today’s IT organizations. This whitepaper explores key issues, practical barriers, and offers best practices for teams taking on this task.
<http://vmturbo.com/resources/events/webinar-deploying-automating-mission-critical-virtual-desktops-at-atg-freight-llc/>How to Deploy & Automate Mission-Critical Virtual Desktops <http://vmturbo.com/resources/events/webinar-deploying-automating-mission-critical-virtual-desktops-at-atg-freight-llc?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=channelnewsmay&utm_content=050615>
ATG Freight, LLC offers extensive transportation services throughout the US, Canada, and Mexico. Watch the webinar to learn how ATG handled an annual workload growth rate of 30%.
Highlight: Turbofest London
On March 19th, we hosted our third Turbofest in London, UK. The event was held at the Andaz Hotel with the cocktail hour taking place in their stunning Neoclassic Temple Room (pictured above). Because of the great customer speakers and a growing crowd, which eventually became standing room only, we are currently planning our next Turbofest event in Atlanta, GA on June 17th.
If you are interested in attending please contact: partners@vmturbo.com <mailto:partners@vmturbo.com>
Upcoming Events
